messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Rat Race & Silver City
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/11/2004 7:12:49 PM Central Standard Time, SandraDodd@aol.com writes: And I  think it would tie-in well with Secondhand Lions   Loved
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/11/2004 7:12:49 PM Central Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

And I think it would tie-in well with Secondhand Lions >>

Loved Secondhand Lions; didn't like Hidalgo.



~~
We saw Secondhand Lions last night. Will didn't like it, but I did. I
laughed a lot. I love Robert Duvall. I thought Michael Cane's hick accent was
horrible.

I really related to it because in the movie Haley Joel Osment is at the same
stage of development as Will has been this summer. Still a skinny little
runt, but changing, growing a jaw-bone instead of baby cheeks, getting long in
the legs. Puberty. :)

Karen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Rat Race & Silver City

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/11/04 5:48:24 PM, ecsamhill@... writes:

<< Have you guys seen Hidalgo? (It came out on DVD in the last month.)


. . .
And I think it would tie-in well with Secondhand Lions >>

Loved Secondhand Lions; didn't like Hidalgo.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Rat Race & Silver City
messages.msgSnippet: ** Marty has, I think, but he wants to go because of wild West elements.** Have you guys seen Hidalgo?  (It came out on DVD in the last month.) Viggo
messages.messageBody:
** Marty has, I think, but he wants to go because of "wild West" elements.**


Have you guys seen Hidalgo? (It came out on DVD in the last month.)

Viggo Mortensen with an "aw, shucks" cowboy accent is just
irresistable. (For you, not for Marty.)

And I think it would tie-in well with Secondhand Lions for the
American-movie-ized melodrama with the Arabian/N.African setting.

Betsy

messages.subject: Rat Race & Silver City
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/11/04 12:28:44 PM, Earthmomma67@aol.com writes:  Marty has, I think, but he wants to go because of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/11/04 12:28:44 PM, Earthmomma67@... writes:

<< Did you ever see "Rat Race"? >>

Marty has, I think, but he wants to go because of "wild West" elements.

I should rent it. Thanks for the tie-in!
(Oh, I just remembered he got me to watch part of it. Yes, I have an
image... <g> Well, we'll stay on the highway, for sure. <g>)

Sandra
